trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of validation to perform.
trans-unit.target: 指定要执行的验证的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> class can enforce validation using a schema or document type definition (DTD).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>类可以强制使用架构或文档类型定义 (DTD) 验证。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.ValidationType> enumeration specifies the type of validation the created <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instance should perform.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.ValidationType>枚举指定的验证创建的类型<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>实例应执行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instance can be either a validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object created by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> method, or an <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>实例可以是任一验证<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>创建对象<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A>方法，或<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>对象。

trans-unit.source: The validation model has three characteristics, strict, informative, and status.
trans-unit.target: 验证模型具有三个特征，严格、 带有提示性，以及状态。

trans-unit.source: Strict, does not allow the mixing of validation types, informative provides a warning if the schema or document type definition (DTD) cannot be found, and status provides warnings if validation cannot be performed for elements and attributes from schemas.
trans-unit.target: Strict，不允许混合的验证类型，提供有用的信息提供了一条警告，如果找不到架构或文档类型定义 (DTD)，并且状态可以发出警告，如果无法为来自架构元素和属性执行验证。

trans-unit.source: Validates if DTD or schema information is found.
trans-unit.target: 验证是否找到 DTD 或架构信息。

trans-unit.source: This field is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and is applicable only to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader> class.
trans-unit.target: 此字段在 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时，且仅适用于<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>类。
根据 DTD 进行验证。

trans-unit.source: This setting creates an XML 1.0 compliant non-validating parser.
trans-unit.target: 此设置创建符合 XML 1.0 的非验证分析程序。

trans-unit.source: Default attributes are reported and general entities can be resolved by calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ResolveEntity%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 将报告默认属性，可通过调用解决常规实体<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ResolveEntity%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The DOCTYPE is not used for validation purposes.
Validate according to XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas, including inline XML Schemas.
trans-unit.target: 根据 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构（包括内联 XML 架构）进行验证。

trans-unit.source: XML Schemas are associated with namespace URIs either by using the <see langword="schemaLocation" /> attribute or the provided <see langword="Schemas" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 <see langword="schemaLocation" /> 特性或提供的 <see langword="Schemas" /> 特性将 XSD 架构和命名空间 URI 关联起来。

trans-unit.source: Validate according to XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schemas, including inline XDR schemas.
trans-unit.target: 根据 XML 数据简化 (XDR) 架构（包括内联 XDR 架构）进行验证。

trans-unit.source: XDR schemas are recognized using the <see langword="x-schema" /> namespace prefix or the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="x-schema" /> 命名空间前缀或 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas" /> 属性识别 XDR 架构。

trans-unit.source: This field is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and is applicable only to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader> class.
trans-unit.target: 此字段在 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时，且仅适用于<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>类。
